arts.ttl: Roma Ace Insists Players Are Not Accountable for De Rossi Dismissal
arts.sum: Roma ace Stephan El Shaarawy insists the Giallorossi would've changed their attitude regardless of Daniele De Rossi's sacking. Ivan Juric inspired his new side to a crucial 3-0 home victory against Serie A surprise package Udinese. arts.ttl: Ivan Juric Hails ‘Sad’ Roma Players After Udinese Rout
arts.sum: Ivan Juric got his managerial tenure at Roma in the best possible way as the Giallorossi humbled Udinese 3-0 at the Stadio Olimpico. The home team headed into proceedings amidst turmoil surrounding the club's shock decision to sack Daniele De Rossi. arts.ttl: Baldanzi: ‘Intense days, I’ve been dreaming of Roma goal’
arts.sum: Tommaso Baldanzi admits he’s been dreaming of his first Roma goal since joining the club...

arts.ttl: Roma's turbulent week ends with a dream debut for new coach Ivan Jurić
arts.sum: Artem Dovbyk’s first-half goal and Paulo Dybala’s penalty at the start of the second period set Roma on its way before Tommaso Baldanzi secured the 3-0 win in the team’s first match since the surprise dismissal of Daniele De Rossi on Wednesday. The first goal of the Jurić era came in the 19th minute as Dovbyk raced onto Stephan El Shaarawy’s through ball and fired into the far bottom corner.

arts.ttl: El Shaarawy: ‘Roma players not responsible’ for De Rossi axe

arts.ttl: Juric on first Roma victory: ‘A beautiful response, but it’s only the first game’
arts.sum: In a stunning turnaround, Ivan Juric’s tenure as Roma’s new head coach began with a resounding 3-0 victory over Udinese. The Giallorossi, who had struggled at the start of the season, finally found their form with goals from Dovbyk, Dybala (from the penalty spot), and Baldanzi. Following the match, the Croatian manager shared his thoughts on the team’s performance in an interview with Sky Sport. Juric expressed surprise at the team’s rapid adaptation to his tactics, stating, “We did well, very well in the first half. I think in the second half we started to lose our distances a bit The post Juric on first Roma victory: ‘A beautiful response, but it’s only the first game’ appeared first on FootItalia.com.

El conjunto Romano respira tranquilo después de vivir una de las semanas más difíciles. Un zurdazo de Dovbyk y dos tantos de Dybala dan una felicidad momentánea antes de su inicio en la Europa League.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Roma 3-0 Udinese: Match Report
arts.sum: Roma’s new era under Ivan Jurić got off to a flying start as the Giallorossi swept aside Udinese 3-0 in a commanding performance at the Stadio Olimpico. The Croatian tactician, appointed just days ago following Daniele De Rossi’s unexpected dismissal, immediately stamped his authority on the team with a tactical shift and some surprising personnel choices. Roma wasted no time asserting themselves, with Artem Dovbyk breaking the deadlock early on. The Ukrainian striker latched onto a precise through ball from Stephan El Shaarawy, calmly rounding the goalkeeper before slotting home. arts.ttl: Roma vs Udinese 3-0: Roma Romp to Victory
arts.sum: It's been a bit of a mad week for Roma. Ivan Juric will breathe a sigh of relief though as at least on the pitch things seem to be getting a little better. Roma romp to victory and get their first win, eventually. The post Roma vs Udinese 3-0: Roma Romp to Victory appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
